Html:
hi all,

I see the subject was debated - a solution was offered at this link http://www.dotnetjunkies.com/WebLog/joshuagough/archive/2006/01/20/134825.aspx

Unfortunatelly, this link does not exist anymore, can anyone point to some other location where I can find something on this subject, or is there a short description of what I need to do in order to load an url that asks for authentication.

 

Thanks,
kowalsky
